DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare three different regimen volume replacement cardiac surgery , e.g . Albumin 5 % , Hydroxyethylstarch 130/0.4 ( HES ) Ringer-Lactate ( RL ) . Main Outcome parameter : chest tube drainage coagulation parameter . The investigator hypothesis HES safe Albumin , however less expensive . Whether RL even less expensive safe alternative show .
DOC.brief_title: Humanalbumin , Hydroxyethylstarch Ringer Lactate During Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: Valve replacement Coronary bypass surgery Severe leave ventricular dysfunction Coagulation disorder
